name: Viridescent Venerer
title: Dream of Broken Leaves: Viridescent Venerer
desc: "One day, in those boundless hunting grounds... we will meet again."
in_play_description: When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Anemo Die. (Once per Round) Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Anemo.

skills.desc: When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Anemo Die. (Once per Round) Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Anemo. (A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
